mn28:7.1.pli: Hoti kho so, āvuso, samayo yaṁ bāhirā āpodhātu pakuppati.
mn28:7.1.en: There comes a time when the exterior water element flares up.

mn28:12.1.pli: Hoti kho so, āvuso, samayo yaṁ bāhirā āpodhātu pakuppati.
mn28:12.1.en: There comes a time when the exterior water element flares up.

mn28:12.3.pli: Hoti kho so, āvuso, samayo yaṁ mahāsamudde yojanasatikānipi udakāni ogacchanti, dviyojanasatikānipi udakāni ogacchanti, tiyojanasatikānipi udakāni ogacchanti, catuyojanasatikānipi udakāni ogacchanti, pañcayojanasatikānipi udakāni ogacchanti, chayojanasatikānipi udakāni ogacchanti, sattayojanasatikānipi udakāni ogacchanti.
mn28:12.3.en: There comes a time when the water in the ocean sinks down a hundred leagues, or two, three, four, five, six, up to seven hundred leagues.

mn28:12.4.pli: Hoti kho so, āvuso, samayo yaṁ mahāsamudde sattatālampi udakaṁ saṇṭhāti, chattālampi udakaṁ saṇṭhāti, pañcatālampi udakaṁ saṇṭhāti, catuttālampi udakaṁ saṇṭhāti, titālampi udakaṁ saṇṭhāti, dvitālampi udakaṁ saṇṭhāti, tālamattampi udakaṁ saṇṭhāti.
mn28:12.4.en: There comes a time when the water in the ocean stands just seven palm trees deep, or six, five, four, three, two, or even just one palm tree deep.

mn28:12.5.pli: Hoti kho so, āvuso, samayo yaṁ mahāsamudde sattaporisampi udakaṁ saṇṭhāti, chapporisampi udakaṁ saṇṭhāti, pañcaporisampi udakaṁ saṇṭhāti, catupporisampi udakaṁ saṇṭhāti, tiporisampi udakaṁ saṇṭhāti, dviporisampi udakaṁ saṇṭhāti, porisamattampi udakaṁ saṇṭhāti.
mn28:12.5.en: There comes a time when the water in the ocean stands just seven fathoms deep, or six, five, four, three, two, or even just one fathom deep.

mn28:12.6.pli: Hoti kho so, āvuso, samayo yaṁ mahāsamudde aḍḍhaporisampi udakaṁ saṇṭhāti, kaṭimattampi udakaṁ saṇṭhāti, jāṇukamattampi udakaṁ saṇṭhāti, gopphakamattampi udakaṁ saṇṭhāti.
mn28:12.6.en: There comes a time when the water in the ocean stands just half a fathom deep, or waist deep, or knee deep, or even just ankle deep.

mn28:12.7.pli: Hoti kho so, āvuso, samayo, yaṁ mahāsamudde aṅgulipabbatemanamattampi udakaṁ na hoti.
mn28:12.7.en: There comes a time when there isn’t enough water in the ocean even to wet the tip of your finger.

mn28:17.1.pli: Hoti kho so, āvuso, samayo yaṁ bāhirā tejodhātu pakuppati.
mn28:17.1.en: There comes a time when the exterior fire element flares up.

mn28:17.4.pli: Hoti kho so, āvuso, samayo yaṁ kukkuṭapattenapi nhārudaddulenapi aggiṁ gavesanti.
mn28:17.4.en: There comes a time when they go looking for a fire, taking just chicken feathers and strips of sinew as kindling.

mn28:22.1.pli: Hoti kho so, āvuso, samayo yaṁ bāhirā vāyodhātu pakuppati.
mn28:22.1.en: There comes a time when the exterior air element flares up.

mn28:22.3.pli: Hoti kho so, āvuso, samayo yaṁ gimhānaṁ pacchime māse tālavaṇṭenapi vidhūpanenapi vātaṁ pariyesanti, ossavanepi tiṇāni na icchanti.
mn28:22.3.en: There comes a time, in the last month of summer, when they look for wind by using a palm-leaf or fan, and even the grasses in the drip-fringe of a thatch roof don’t stir.

mlDocs.title:
Middle Discourses 28
The Longer Simile of the Elephant’s Footprint

an7.66:3.2.pli: Hoti kho so, bhikkhave, samayo yaṁ kadāci karahaci dīghassa addhuno accayena bahūni vassāni bahūni vassasatāni bahūni vassasahassāni bahūni vassasatasahassāni devo na vassati.
an7.66:3.2.en: There comes a time when, after a very long period has passed, the rain doesn’t fall. For many years, many hundreds, many thousands, many hundreds of thousands of years no rain falls.

an7.66:4.1.pli: Hoti kho so, bhikkhave, samayo yaṁ kadāci karahaci dīghassa addhuno accayena dutiyo sūriyo pātubhavati.
an7.66:4.1.en: There comes a time when, after a very long period has passed, a second sun appears.

an7.66:5.1.pli: Hoti kho so, bhikkhave, samayo yaṁ kadāci karahaci dīghassa addhuno accayena tatiyo sūriyo pātubhavati.
an7.66:5.1.en: There comes a time when, after a very long period has passed, a third sun appears.

an7.66:6.1.pli: Hoti kho so, bhikkhave, samayo yaṁ kadāci karahaci dīghassa addhuno accayena catuttho sūriyo pātubhavati.
an7.66:6.1.en: There comes a time when, after a very long period has passed, a fourth sun appears.

an7.66:7.1.pli: Hoti kho so, bhikkhave, samayo yaṁ kadāci karahaci dīghassa addhuno accayena pañcamo sūriyo pātubhavati.
an7.66:7.1.en: There comes a time when, after a very long period has passed, a fifth sun appears.

an7.66:8.1.pli: Hoti kho so, bhikkhave, samayo yaṁ kadāci karahaci dīghassa addhuno accayena chaṭṭho sūriyo pātubhavati.
an7.66:8.1.en: There comes a time when, after a very long period has passed, a sixth sun appears.

an7.66:9.1.pli: Hoti kho so, bhikkhave, samayo yaṁ kadāci karahaci dīghassa addhuno accayena sattamo sūriyo pātubhavati.
an7.66:9.1.en: There comes a time when, after a very long period has passed, a seventh sun appears.

mlDocs.title:
Numbered Discourses 7
7. The Great Chapter
66. The Seven Suns

an3.62:1.3.pli: Hoti so, bhikkhave, samayo yaṁ mahāaggiḍāho vuṭṭhāti.
an3.62:1.3.en: There comes a time when a great fire flares up,

an3.62:2.1.pli: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, hoti so samayo yaṁ mahāmegho vuṭṭhāti.
an3.62:2.1.en: Furthermore, there comes a time when a great storm gathers,

an3.62:3.1.pli: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, hoti so samayo yaṁ bhayaṁ hoti aṭavisaṅkopo, cakkasamāruḷhā jānapadā pariyāyanti.
an3.62:3.1.en: Furthermore, there comes a time of peril from wild savages, and the countryfolk mount their vehicles and flee everywhere.

an3.62:4.3.pli: Hoti so, bhikkhave, samayo yaṁ mahāaggiḍāho vuṭṭhāti.
an3.62:4.3.en: There comes a time when a great fire flares up,

an3.62:5.1.pli: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, hoti so samayo yaṁ mahāmegho vuṭṭhāti.
an3.62:5.1.en: Furthermore, there comes a time when a great storm gathers,

an3.62:6.1.pli: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, hoti so samayo yaṁ bhayaṁ hoti aṭavisaṅkopo, cakkasamāruḷhā jānapadā pariyāyanti.
an3.62:6.1.en: Furthermore, there comes a time of peril from wild savages, and the countryfolk mount their vehicles and flee everywhere.

mlDocs.title:
Numbered Discourses 3
7. The Great Chapter
62. Perils

sn22.99:1.4.pli: Hoti so, bhikkhave, samayo yaṁ mahāsamuddo ussussati visussati na bhavati;
sn22.99:1.4.en: There comes a time when the ocean dries up and evaporates and is no more.

sn22.99:1.6.pli: Hoti so, bhikkhave, samayo yaṁ sineru pabbatarājā ḍayhati vinassati na bhavati;
sn22.99:1.6.en: There comes a time when Sineru the king of mountains is burned up and destroyed, and is no more.

sn22.99:1.8.pli: Hoti so, bhikkhave, samayo yaṁ mahāpathavī ḍayhati vinassati na bhavati;
sn22.99:1.8.en: There comes a time when the great earth is burned up and destroyed, and is no more.

mn130:18.1.pli: Hoti kho so, bhikkhave, samayo yaṁ kadāci karahaci dīghassa addhuno accayena tassa mahānirayassa puratthimaṁ dvāraṁ apāpurīyati.
mn130:18.1.en: There comes a time when, after a very long period has passed, the eastern gate of the Great Hell is opened.

mn130:18.6.pli: Hoti kho so, bhikkhave, samayo yaṁ kadāci karahaci dīghassa addhuno accayena tassa mahānirayassa pacchimaṁ dvāraṁ apāpurīyati …pe…
mn130:18.6.en: There comes a time when, after a very long period has passed, the western gate …

mn130:19.1.pli: Hoti kho so, bhikkhave, samayo yaṁ kadāci karahaci dīghassa addhuno accayena tassa mahānirayassa puratthimaṁ dvāraṁ apāpurīyati.
mn130:19.1.en: There comes a time when, after a very long period has passed, the eastern gate of the Great Hell is opened.

mlDocs.title:
Middle Discourses 130
Messengers of the Gods

an3.92:1.9.pli: Atha kho, bhikkhave, hoti so samayo yaṁ tassa kassakassa gahapatissa tāni dhaññāni utupariṇāmīni jāyantipi gabbhīnipi honti paccantipi.
an3.92:1.9.en: But there comes a time when that farmer’s crops germinate, flower, and ripen as the seasons change.

an3.92:2.7.pli: Atha kho, bhikkhave, hoti so samayo yaṁ tassa bhikkhuno adhisīlampi sikkhato adhicittampi sikkhato adhipaññampi sikkhato anupādāya āsavehi cittaṁ vimuccati.
an3.92:2.7.en: But there comes a time—as that mendicant trains in the higher ethics, the higher mind, and the higher wisdom—that their mind is freed from defilements by not grasping.

mlDocs.title:
Numbered Discourses 3
10. A Lump of Salt
92. Urgent

mn127:10.1.pli: Hoti kho so, gahapati, samayo, yā tā devatā ekajjhaṁ sannipatanti, tāsaṁ ekajjhaṁ sannipatitānaṁ vaṇṇanānattañhi kho paññāyati no ca ābhānānattaṁ.
mn127:10.1.en: There comes a time, householder, when the deities gather together as one. When they do so, a difference in their color is evident, but not in their radiance.

mn127:11.1.pli: Hoti kho so, gahapati, samayo, yā tā devatā tato vipakkamanti, tāsaṁ tato vipakkamantīnaṁ vaṇṇanānattañceva paññāyati ābhānānattañca.
mn127:11.1.en: There comes a time when those deities go their separate ways. When they do so, a difference both in their color and also in their radiance is evident.

dn27:10.1.pli: Hoti kho so, vāseṭṭha, samayo yaṁ kadāci karahaci dīghassa addhuno accayena ayaṁ loko saṁvaṭṭati.
dn27:10.1.en: There comes a time when, Vāseṭṭha, after a very long period has passed, this cosmos contracts.

dn27:10.4.pli: Hoti kho so, vāseṭṭha, samayo yaṁ kadāci karahaci dīghassa addhuno accayena ayaṁ loko vivaṭṭati.
dn27:10.4.en: There comes a time when, after a very long period has passed, this cosmos expands.

dn1:2.2.1.pli: Hoti kho so, bhikkhave, samayo, yaṁ kadāci karahaci dīghassa addhuno accayena ayaṁ loko saṁvaṭṭati.
dn1:2.2.1.en: There comes a time when, after a very long period has passed, this cosmos contracts.

dn1:2.3.1.pli: Hoti kho so, bhikkhave, samayo, yaṁ kadāci karahaci dīghassa addhuno accayena ayaṁ loko vivaṭṭati.
dn1:2.3.1.en: There comes a time when, after a very long period has passed, this cosmos expands.

mlDocs.title:
Long Discourses 1
The Prime Net
1. Talk on Wanderers

dn24:2.14.11.pli: ‘Hoti kho so, āvuso, samayo yaṁ kadāci karahaci dīghassa addhuno accayena ayaṁ loko saṁvaṭṭati.
dn24:2.14.11.en: ‘There comes a time when, reverends, after a very long period has passed, this cosmos contracts.

dn24:2.15.1.pli: Hoti kho so, āvuso, samayo yaṁ kadāci karahaci dīghassa addhuno accayena ayaṁ loko vivaṭṭati.
dn24:2.15.1.en: There comes a time when, after a very long period has passed, this cosmos expands.

mlDocs.title:
Long Discourses 24
About Pāṭikaputta
1. On Sunakkhatta

an4.170:6.2.pli: Hoti so, āvuso, samayo yaṁ taṁ cittaṁ ajjhattameva santiṭṭhati sannisīdati ekodi hoti samādhiyati.
an4.170:6.2.en: But there comes a time when their mind is stilled internally; it settles, unifies, and becomes immersed in samādhi.

an3.101:2.6.pli: Hoti so, bhikkhave, samayo yaṁ taṁ cittaṁ ajjhattaṁyeva santiṭṭhati sannisīdati ekodi hoti samādhiyati.
an3.101:2.6.en: But there comes a time when that mind is stilled internally; it settles, unifies, and becomes immersed in samādhi.

mlDocs.title:
Numbered Discourses 3
10. A Lump of Salt
101. A Panner

an10.29:3.1.pli: Hoti so, bhikkhave, samayo yaṁ ayaṁ loko saṁvaṭṭati.
an10.29:3.1.en: There comes a time when this world contracts.

mlDocs.title:
Numbered Discourses 10
3. The Great Chapter
29. Kosala (1st)
